debug_text.text: '[GT-Batch] âš ï¸ Batch state not found for ship ' + $ship.idcode + ' (global.$GT_BatchDataList exists: ' + global.$GT_BatchDataList? + ')'
'[GT-Batch-DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') WARNING wareKeysList is NULL!'
'[GT-Batch-DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') WARNING wareKeysList is EMPTY count=0!'
'[GT-Batch-DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Processing ware #' + $wareIdx + ': ' + (if $ware? then @$ware.name else 'NULL') + ' (quota: ' + $tradesForThisWare + '/' + $maxTradesPerWare + ')'
'[GT-Batch-DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Found: ' + $sellOffersForWare.count + ' sell, ' + $buyOffersForWare.count + ' buy offers for ' + (if $ware? then @$ware.name else 'NULL')

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and ($sellOffersForWare.count gt $maxOffersPerWareForMatching or $buyOffersForWare.count gt $maxOffersPerWareForMatching)

debug_text.text: '[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… Added intra-sector offers for ' + (if $ware? then @$ware.name else 'NULL') + ' in ' + @$currentSector.knownname + ': ' + $addedSell + ' sell, ' + $addedBuy + ' buy (beyond top ' + $maxOffersPerWareForMatching + ')'
'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… REACHABLE VIA GATES: ' + @$offerSector.knownname + ' (distance: ' + $testDistance + ') - Ship NOT isolated (can leave zone via gates)'
'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âŒ UNREACHABLE: ' + @$offerSector.knownname + ' (distance: ' + $testDistance + ')'
'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš ï¸ SAME ZONE (BLACKLISTED): ' + @$offerSector.knownname + ' (distance: 0) - Blacklisted, cannot use for trading (does not prevent isolation)'
'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… SAME ZONE (REACHABLE): ' + @$offerSector.knownname + ' (distance: 0) - Ship NOT isolated (can trade in same zone)'
'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… REACHABLE VIA GATES: ' + @$offerSector.knownname + ' (distance: ' + $testDistance + ') - Ship NOT isolated (can leave zone via gates)'
'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âŒ UNREACHABLE: ' + @$offerSector.knownname + ' (distance: ' + $testDistance + ')'
'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš ï¸ SAME ZONE (BLACKLISTED): ' + @$offerSector.knownname + ' (distance: 0) - Blacklisted, cannot use for trading (does not prevent isolation)'
'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… SAME ZONE (REACHABLE): ' + @$offerSector.knownname + ' (distance: 0) - Ship NOT isolated (can trade in same zone)'
'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ” ISOLATION CHECK: Tested ' + $testCount + ' sectors requiring gate jumps, ' + $reachableViaGatesCount + ' reachable (ship in ' + @$currentSector.knownname + ')'
'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ” NO SECTORS REQUIRING GATES: All offers are from same zone - ship ISOLATED (can\'t leave via gates)'
'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸš¨ ISOLATED: All ' + $testCount + ' sectors requiring gate jumps are unreachable - ship ISOLATED'
'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… NOT ISOLATED: ' + $reachableViaGatesCount + ' of ' + $testCount + ' sectors requiring gates are reachable'

'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸš¨ ISOLATION DETECTED: Ship in ' + $currentSectorName + ' (non-blacklisted) but ALL routes to other sectors blocked by blacklist - prioritizing intra-sector trades'

'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ“ ISOLATION LOGBOOK MESSAGE WRITTEN: Ship ' + $shipName + ' in sector ' + $currentSectorName + ' - forced to intra-sector trades only due to blacklisted hub sectors'

'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ’° PRICE VERIFICATION for intra-sector trade:' + '
 sellOfferPrice (RAW): ' + $sellOfferPrice + ' = ' + ($sellOfferPrice/100) + ' Cr' + '
 buyOfferPrice (RAW): ' + $buyOfferPrice + ' = ' + ($buyOfferPrice/100) + ' Cr' + '
 $buyPrice (stored, RAW): ' + $buyPrice + ' = ' + ($buyPrice/100) + ' Cr' + '
 $sellPrice (stored, RAW): ' + $sellPrice + ' = ' + ($sellPrice/100) + ' Cr' + '
 Profit (RAW): ' + $profit + ' = ' + ($profit/100) + ' Cr' + '
 Calculated profit check: (' + ($sellPrice/100) + ' - ' + ($buyPrice/100) + ') * ' + $maxAmount + ' = ' + (($sellPrice - $buyPrice) * $maxAmount / 100) + ' Cr'

'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… INTRA-SECTOR trade created' + $isolationLabel + ': ' + (if $sellOfferWare? then @$sellOfferWare.name else 'NULL') + ' in ' + @$currentSector.knownname + ' (Profit: ' + ($profit/100) + ' Cr, ROI: ' + ($roi/1) + '%, Score: ' + ($efficiency/1) + ')'
'[GT-Cache-DIAG] Trade NOT cached: Profit le 0 (Profit=' + ($profit/100) + ' Cr, ROI=' + ($roi/1) + '%)'
'[GT-Cache-DIAG] Trade NOT cached: ROI below threshold (ROI=' + ($roi/1) + '% lt Threshold=' + ($cacheThreshold/1) + '%, Profit=' + ($profit/100) + ' Cr)'

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and not ($sellOfferWare? and $sellOfferOwner? and $buyOfferOwner?)

debug_text.text: '[GT-Cache-DEBUG] âš Trade NOT cached (validation failed): ROI=' + ($roi/1) + '%, Profit=' + ($profit/100) + ' Cr, sellOfferWare=' + ($sellOfferWare? and 'OK' or 'NULL') + ', sellOfferOwner=' + ($sellOfferOwner? and 'OK' or 'NULL') + ', buyOfferOwner=' + ($buyOfferOwner? and 'OK' or 'NULL')
'[GT-Cache] âœ… Trade cached: ' + $sellOfferWare.name + ', ROI=' + ($roi/1) + '%, Profit=' + ($profit/100) + ' Cr, Distance=' + $routeDistance + ' jumps (cache now: ' + $cacheCount + ' entries)'
'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Complete. Total: ' + $tradeList.count + ' trades'
'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Signalled waiting cue to resume'
